mapper.select: SELECT CLND_ID , CLND_DATE , CLND_CONTENT , PRJ_ID , DEL_YN FROM CALENDAR WHERE PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR (CLND_ID , CLND_DATE , CLND_CONTENT , PRJ_ID , DEL_YN) VALUES ('CLND_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_CLND_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{clndDate} , #{clndContent} , #{prjId} , 'N')
